newsitem.title: USA: CompScript Q1 shr loss $0.12 vs profit.
newsitem.headline: CompScript Q1 shr loss $0.12 vs profit.

text.p: NOTES: Full company name is CompScript Inc.

The company said results have been restated to reflect one-time charges of $613,457 associated with the acquisitions of Medical Services Consortium, Campo's Medical Pharmacy and Hytree Pharmacy Services. The acquisitions all closed in Q1 and were accounted for as a pooling of interests.

The results also included a one-time charge of $800,000 against the realization of a non-recourse note receivable related to assets acquired in connection with the company's reverse acquisition with Capital Brands Inc during Q2 1996, it said.
Excluding those charges, the company's net loss would have been $202,645 or a share loss of $0.01, it said.
The reverse acquisition was used as a tool to go public by purchasing a publicly traded company, it said. Compscript was a privately held company before that time.
